text: Iyakubara mrtyura samayata tomaloke upasthita achila neki? Te'om yetiya nija santanasakalaka kaichila, ‘mora pichata tomaloke kara ibadata karaiba? Sihamte kaichila, ‘ami aponara ilaha arau aponara pitr-purausa ibraahima, ichama'ila, ichahakara ilaha- se'i ejana ilaharae'i ibadata karaima; arau ami te'omra ocarate'i atmasamarpanakarai’
